GS24vakyp_au:2097: kḷpi saṃpadyamāne yā $ caturthī sā vikārataḥ &
GS24vakyp_au:2099: vākye saṃpadyateḥ kartā $ saṅghaś cvyantasya kathyate &
GS24vakyp_au:2101: atvaṃ saṃpadyate yas tvaṃ $ na tasmin yuṣmadāśrayā &
GS24vakyp_au:2105: savyāpārataraḥ kaś cit $ kva cid dharmaḥ pratīyate &
GS24vakyp_au:2108: gamyeta sādhanaṃ hy atra % savyāpāraṃ pratīyate // 3.7.120 //
GS24vakyp_au:2109: tvam anyo bhavasīty eṣā $ tatra syāt parikalpanā &
GS24vakyp_au:2110: rājñi bhṛtyatvamāpanne % yathā tadvad gatir bhavet // 3.7.121 //
GS24vakyp_au:2120: dravyamātrasya tu praiṣe $ pṛcchyāder loḍ vidhīyate &
GS24vakyp_au:2121: sakriyasya prayogas tu % yadā sa viṣayo ṇicaḥ // 3.7.126 //
GS24vakyp_au:2124: kriyāyāḥ prerakaṃ karma $ hetuḥ kartuḥ prayojakaḥ &
GS24vakyp_au:2131: bhedasya ca vivakṣāyāṃ $ pūrvāṃ pūrvāṃ kriyāṃ prati &
GS24vakyp_au:2137: vikalpenaiva sarvatra $ saṃjñe syātām ubhe yadi &
GS24vakyp_au:2138: ārambheṇa na yogasya % pratyākhyānaṃ samaṃ bhavet // 3.7.134 //
GS24vakyp_au:2140: āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra % dvairūpyaṃ bhajate kriyā // 3.7.135 //
GS24vakyp_au:2142: apādānādhikāraḥ nirdiṣṭaviṣayaṃ kiṃ cid $ upāttaviṣayaṃ tathā &
GS24vakyp_au:2144: saṃyogabhedād bhinnātmā $ gamir eva bhramir yathā &
GS24vakyp_au:2146: dravyasvabhāvo na dhrauvyam $ iti sūtre pratīyate &
GS24vakyp_au:2147: apāyaviṣayaṃ dhrauvyaṃ % yat tu tāvad vivakṣitam // 3.7.138 //
GS24vakyp_au:2148: saraṇe devadattasya $ dhrauvyaṃ pāte tu vājinaḥ &
GS24vakyp_au:2150: ubhāv apy adhruvau meṣau $ yady apy ubhayakarmaje &
GS24vakyp_au:2151: vibhāge pravibhakte tu % kriye tatra vivakṣite // 3.7.140 //
GS24vakyp_au:2153: meṣayoḥ svakriyāpekṣaṃ % kartṛtvaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak // 3.7.141 //
GS24vakyp_au:2154: abhedena kriyaikā tu $ dvisādhyā ced vivakṣitā &
GS24vakyp_au:2155: meṣāv apāye kartārau % yady anyo vidyate 'vadhiḥ // 3.7.142 //
GS24vakyp_au:2156: gatir vinā tv avadhinā $ nāpāya iti gamyate &
GS24vakyp_au:2157: vṛkṣasya parṇaṃ patatīty % evaṃ bhāṣye nidarśitam // 3.7.143 //
GS24vakyp_au:2159: yugapan na vivakṣyante % sarve dharmā balāhake // 3.7.144 //
GS24vakyp_au:2161: karaṇatvaṃ yato nāsti % tasmāt tad ubhayaṃ saha // 3.7.145 //
GS24vakyp_au:2162: ekaiva vā satī śaktir $ dvirūpā vyavatiṣṭhate &
GS24vakyp_au:2164: nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yo $ bhītrādīnāṃ ca yo vidhiḥ &
GS24vakyp_au:2175: idam atreti bhāvānām $ abhāvān na prakalpate &
GS24vakyp_au:2179: yady apy upavasir deśa- $ viśeṣam anurudhyate &
GS24vakyp_au:2195: vyatirekaḥ sa dharmau dvau % labhate viṣayāntare // 3.7.161 //
GS24vakyp_au:2196: prādhānyaṃ svaguṇe labdhvā $ pradhāne yāti śeṣatām &
GS24vakyp_au:2201: saṃbodhanaṃ na vākyārtha $ iti pūrvebhya āgamaḥ &
GS24vakyp_au:2205: dravyaṃ tu yad yathābhūtaṃ $ tad atyantaṃ tathā bhavet &
GS24vakyp_au:2207: tasmād yat karaṇaṃ dravyaṃ $ tat karma na punar bhavet &
